## Checklist

- [ ] Tested locally
- [ ] Migrations created (if schema changed)
- [ ] Environment variables documented (if new ones added)
- [ ] Build passes (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Updated DEPLOYMENT.md (if deployment process changed)

## Database Changes

- [ ] No database changes
- [ ] New migration created: `prisma/migrations/xxx`

## New Environment Variables

List any new env vars needed:
- `NEW_VAR_NAME` - description
```
